text: Haha I just saw this too and was thinking the same thing
You can check it out now, working on writing a tutorial
anyone tried filtering HubDB results based on a multiselect foreign ID field? I can filter based on multiselect, but something is throwing me off and I think it’s related to the foreign ID.

I’m basically trying to do something like the real estate listing example but with the foreign ID field as the filter. I can hardcode the filter, but trying to load the values from that column isn’t working as expected.
when I use other multiselect columns instead of “industry_experience” it loads all the values
<@U2H3TT8F2> - Any idea why that new code isn't working properly to filter out past events? Is it the locationquery that is the problem? Thank you for your time!
New tutorial on multilevel dynamic pages with child HubDB tables <https://designers.HubSpot.com/how-to-build-multilevel-dynamic-templates>
